captions.en: Hello everyone
If you're following me on Instagram
you probably know that I'm going to the US soon
But you're probably curious
why I'm going to the States
so I'll tell you guys!
I'm going to the US for an internship
I actually started applying for internships a while ago
but this one was quite sudden
I only found out I got the internship
around the month of June
and I need to arrive in the US in early or mid August
So I've been pretty busy these past two months
I had a lot to deal with
But luckily, I got my visa now
Many of the things I had to take care of are pretty much done
All I need to do now is to pack my things
It seems like I don't have that much else to take care of
Just packing my stuff
Oh! I also need to do a PCR test
You have to take a PCR test three days before your flight
and get a negative result, so you can board the plane
I've already made the appointment
so all I need now is
get tested before my flight
I hope everything goes well
Also I was thinking that
this is a very special trip for me
so I'd like to document it
taking you with me to pack
and go to the US
My room is very messy now
it's full of all kinds of stuff
I bought some things that I might need when I'm abroad
Let's see what we've got
dental floss
pimple patches
and some stationery
portable charger
but I think it's called 'chōng diàn bǎo' in China
and then these are... face masks
dental floss rods
I bought this today
it's compression bags
If you have lots of clothes,
you can use compression bags
it helps (the clothes) to take up less space
Let me show you this luggage tag
I think it's super cute
Taipei 101
xiaolongbao
Queen's head
and a Formosan black bear
It's super cute
This is my packing list
The ones in red are the things I haven't bought yet
Now I found a problem
I'm trying to figure out what to put in my suitcase now
and then I realized that there are some things
that I still need to use on a daily basis
So I feel that
I can only put them in my suitcase the day before I go abroad
So, um... the idea I have right now is to
make a mark on what I still need to use on the list
and put them in my suitcases the day before I leave
This box is full of stationery
let's see if there's anything I can bring with me
There's just some pens inside
Cards
A notebook
I like to write down English words in this kind of notebook
My old glasses
I think I'll take them too, as a backup
Earplugs
They look a bit special
An empty pencil case
It's a bit hard to zip
I don't think I'll take it with me
Staples
Here is the stapler
I'll bring them both
Let's go shopping
Do you have any alcohol wipes?
Only the small packs
Where is it?
On the second row, next to the towels
Oh, okay, thanks!
Found it!
Excuse me
Do you have any correction tape replacements sold in boxes?
Or do you have them in bulk?
Yes, we do. Which brand would you like?
I forget the name of the brand
It's... let me see
It's this kind, yup, this kind
Do you have any sold in boxes?
Yes, do you want a box of it?
Let me think about it
How many are there per box?
Okay, let me check the price
It's the same, it's 290
Oh, so it won't be any cheaper (than buying in bulk)
This is alrey the discounted price
Okay, I'll take a look at it. Thanks.
Do you need a company tax ID number?
No, I don't need it
Just a moment
Okay
That'll be 857
Okay
Today I'm going to take my PCR test
Let's go!
Finished!
I got my covid test results
Actually, I was thinking about
opening it with you all when I'm back
but I couldn't wait to find out the results
so I opened it when I was at the hospital
The result was negative
so everything went pretty well
After two days, I can finally fly to the States
In a bit, I'll be heading out to the airport
I finally finished packing
My friend doesn't think I've packed enough things
I'm going to be there for about a year
She thinks this isn't a lot
but I feel I've already packed so much
Let's go
So many people
You just go over there and check
after your luggage go in
then, you can depart
But we're gonna hang around for a little while
Yup! Because we can't go in there with you
Did you eat yet?
I ate...
but I almost threw up all of it in the car
Why?
I got emotion sickness
We're waiting for take off
(Flight time) 14 hours, isn't it?
My first meal on the plane
This is bacon and kimchi
Some fruit
A small piece of cake
The main course is chicken and potatoes in white sauce
with some brocoli and carrots
Bye bye Taiwan
